snippet.title: Paranormal Snap Shot Trailer - NEW ANOMALY HUNTING GAME
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game now! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3337630/Paranormal_Snap_Shot/

Trapped in an endless looping school, can you find your way out by photographing all of the anomalies?

Paranormal Snap Shot is a psychological horror game set in a Japanese school in which you must locate and take pictures of any anomalies you come across to be able to move forward!

Inspired by Japanese horror and anomaly hunting games comes Paranormal Snap Shot, as a new recruit for a mysterious paranormal evidence team you've been sent to the Mugen no Gakkou school. Your one and only job is to discover and photograph anything you deem out of place.

Not everything is as it seems in this school, good luck filling your photo album full of paranormal, ghostly encounters and reality breaking anomalies.

Features
- Normal Mode
- Unlockable Hard Mode
- Secret Ending
- Easter Eggs
- Photo Album

Play Time
- 1 - 2 hours (Longer for full completion)



Join the discord here - https://discord.gg/EFg799dQqb
